divs: Sighting Details Good afternoon, I have got Your letter. Here is answer to it. You asked to write more detailed about that I offer You. I so understand that MUFON wholly serious organization, and with her possible to co-operate. I want to pop the question. I give that it is necessary You, but You that it is necessary me. I think this wholly fair... You get the physical contact with stranger, but I shall be able to study the anomaly of the people. I hope that was expressed clear. All word it is necessary to understand literally! Wait Your answer. RESPECTFULLY YOURS FANTOM
